Package org.azd.utils

Class Request

java.lang.Object
org.azd.utils.Client
public class Request
extends java.lang.Object
Wrapper clss to build request url and to call Azure DevOps REST API

  • Method Details

    • request

      public static java.lang.String request​(java.lang.String requestMethod, AzDDefaultParameters defaultParameters, java.lang.String resourceId, java.lang.String project, java.lang.String area, java.lang.String id, java.lang.String resource, java.lang.String apiVersion, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> queryString, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> body) throws DefaultParametersException, java.io.IOException
      Request the Azure DevOps REST API and builds the request url dynamically based on resource id and endpoints passed
      Parameters:
      requestMethod - type of request GET, POST, PATCH, DELETE RequestMethod
      defaultParameters - instance of default parameters class
      resourceId - pass the resource id. Refere ResourceId class
      project - name of the project
      area - resource area
      id - resource id
      resource - resource area endpoint
      apiVersion - api version
      queryString - query string to append the url
      body - body of the request to post and patch
      Returns:
      String response from API
      Throws:
      DefaultParametersException - -> DefaultParametersException
      java.io.IOException - -> IOException

    • request

      public static java.lang.String request​(java.lang.String requestMethod, AzDDefaultParameters defaultParameters, java.lang.String resourceId, java.lang.String project, java.lang.String area, java.lang.String id, java.lang.String resource, java.lang.String apiVersion, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> queryString, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> body, java.lang.String contentType) throws DefaultParametersException, java.io.IOException
      Request the Azure DevOps REST API and builds the request url dynamically based on resource id and endpoints passed
      Parameters:
      requestMethod - type of request GET, POST, PATCH, DELETE RequestMethod
      defaultParameters - instance of default parameters class
      resourceId - pass the resource id. Refere ResourceId class
      project - name of the project
      area - resource area
      id - resource id
      resource - resource area endpoint
      apiVersion - api version
      queryString - query string to append the url
      body - body of the request to post and patch
      contentType - content type to pass in the request header
      Returns:
      String response from API
      Throws:
      DefaultParametersException - -> DefaultParametersException
      java.io.IOException - -> IOException

    • request

      public static java.lang.String request​(java.lang.String requestMethod, AzDDefaultParameters defaultParameters, java.lang.String resourceId, java.lang.String project, java.lang.String area, java.lang.String id, java.lang.String resource, java.lang.String apiVersion, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> queryString, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> body, java.util.List<java.lang.Object> requestBody, java.lang.String contentType) throws DefaultParametersException, java.io.IOException
      Request the Azure DevOps REST API and builds the request url dynamically based on resource id and endpoints passed
      Parameters:
      requestMethod - type of request GET, POST, PATCH, DELETE RequestMethod
      defaultParameters - instance of default parameters class
      resourceId - pass the resource id. Refere ResourceId class
      project - name of the project
      area - resource area
      id - resource id
      resource - resource area endpoint
      apiVersion - api version
      queryString - query string to append the url
      body - body of the request to post and patch
      requestBody - body of the request to post and patch. This should be a list of HashMap
      contentType - content type to pass in the request header
      Returns:
      String response from API
      Throws:
      DefaultParametersException - -> DefaultParametersException
      java.io.IOException - -> IOException
